summary: Follows the same pattern of the other Faces of Death movies. In this one we see many staged and not so staged looking deaths ranging from bungee jumping accidents and magic tricks gone bad.
cast: James B. Schwartz|John Zimmerman|John Alan Schwartz
keywords: death in title|faked footage|part fiction|part real part fake|part staged

title: Rostros de la muerte IV
